title: Mine Slingshot
description: In Mine Slingshot, you wield a colossal slingshot to hurl Minecraft mobs at relentless zombies. Strategize to topple structures and eliminate multiple foes by targeting their footholds. Merge mobs for stronger allies by colliding them. Your mission? Clear each level by vanquishing all zombies in this explosive and inventive twist on the classic slingshot game.
